sudoku

Class Sudoku

  • java.lang.Object
    • sudoku.Sudoku

  • public class Sudoku
extends java.lang.Object
    Sudoku class used to create a Sudoku object. Containing methods using backtracking to solve a sudoku puzzle.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Johannes Bastmark, Szymon Stypa, Axel Domell
    See Also:
    Github repository

    • Method Detail

      • size

        int size()
        Returns size. Size is the length or height of the board.
        Returns:
        int size

      • filled

        private boolean filled()
        Returns filled. True if board contains no "0" else false.
        Returns:
        boolean filled

      • insert

        boolean insert(int value,
               int row,
               int col)
        Inserts value at row, col in the sudoku board. Returns true if value could be inserted at position else false.
        Parameters:
        value - value
        row - row in board
        col - column in board
        Returns:
        boolean insert

      • getBoard

        int[][] getBoard()
        Returns the sudoku board.
        Returns:
        int[][] getBoard

      • get

        int get(int row,
        int col)
        Returns value at row, col in the sudoku board.
        Parameters:
        row - row in board
        col - column in board
        Returns:
        int value

      • valid

        boolean valid()
        Returns boolean. True if board is valid else false. Board is valid if no value exist more than one time in each given row, column and section of the sudoku board. values of 0 can be multiple.
        Returns:
        boolean valid

      • solved

        boolean solved()
        Returns boolean. True if board is solved else false (valid and filled). Board is valid if no value exist more than one time in each given row, column and section of the sudoku board.
        Returns:
        boolean solved

      • solve

        boolean solve()
        Returns boolean. True if the sudoku board could be solved else false.
        Returns:
        boolean solve

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns String. Returns a string representation of the current sudoku board.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String toString
